arg.name: words
arg.help: WORDS: extractWords() allows for various extraction of words such as BagOfWords, Stemming, etc. "operations" include:

arg.name: stopwords
arg.help: STOPWORDS: select sets of stopwords. Locations are given by resource locations.

arg.name: wordlengths
arg.help: WORDLENGTHS: set limits on lengths of words (values are inclusive)

arg.name: wordtypes
arg.help: WORDTYPES: word types to extract. Entering zero args will give a list of types. These are likely to change but could be "acronym", "capitalized", etc.
